CustomField.formula: IF( AND( (TEXT(HUB_Handle__c) != '' || TEXT(HUB_Handle__c) != '00'), (TEXT(Hub_Origin__c) != '' || TEXT(Hub_Origin__c) != '00') ), true, IF( AND( (TEXT(HUB_Handle__c) = '' || TEXT(HUB_Handle__c) = '00'), (TEXT(Hub_Origin__c) != '' || TEXT(Hub_Origin__c) != '00') ), true, IF( AND( (TEXT(HUB_Handle__c) != '' || TEXT(HUB_Handle__c) != '00'), (TEXT(Hub_Origin__c) = '' || TEXT(Hub_Origin__c) = '00') ), true, false)))
CustomField.label: TEST
